message.body: Cindy just came to treat Phillip's room. Any new bites last night?
Nope!
Did she find anything in Phillips room?
Cool. Phillip said she didn’t see anything obvious in his room or Kevin’s. She treated both to make sure.
I just texted him to see when he last got bitten.
Yeah she never saw anything in mine even when I was cooovered
Looks at the Welts all the way down my legs lol I'm clearly allergic to them
I suspect Beth might have had better luck finding them. All Beth did anymore was just bedbugs - 6 days a week. She is a bedbug expert.
That was from a few days ago?
No no!!
Omg no
That was from the early days of this, when I first told you about it
I was just appreciating how far my exposed skin has come
Cool. Much better now?
￼Pics of the floor. I'm not messy or dirty! Those white marks on floor are permanent , look like spackle or white paint?
It doesn't look half as bad in person as in those pics tho and also I bet I could lightly buff some off, just haven't bothered to yet
￼View from other side (I stole the mop for a bit to mop
It looks much much prettier without the rug.
Sorry my phone died & when I got it turned on it was like 2 AM your time. So are the bite marks all gone?
Tommy may have some idea how to get the white stuff up with out taking off the varnish.
Ok! They're healing :)
Thanks for asking :)
I know you said it was a throwback pic but I wanted to make sure. It is funny how the bite from the same bug can do nothing to one people but leave a welt on another person.
I have marks still from all of them but they're slowly fading. Hopefully they'll fade all the way
The leg ones are pretty bad haha my friend was teasing me about having an abusive bf that hits me lol
I'm sure it'll be fine. It's only been a few weeks really
Thank you for asking :)
Geez I'm sorry. I probably should have asked you this awhile ago but did you use cortisone?
Did I tell you that me & Jo & one our other roommate all have had some sort of bites? I got bit by something a couple weeks ago & so did Jo but they went away.
Last weekend we went camping at the North Shore. Jo got bitten up & our other roommate got it so bad he was covered in this crazy rash had to get a steroid cream. But I didn't get really anything.
Hahaha what!!? That's awful! I did get cortisone thanks :) it was meeting w my ex while buying cortisone cream and bug spray at cvs that he said I should call you bc that prob wasn't normal lol
He's really to thank for my having mentioned it to you at all
I felt really silly mentioning it
Wait the north shore soooo you're back in the us!!???
Oooh
In Hawaii
lol sorry but can't feel sorry for you lol
I just wish I had known earlier. We might have been able to prevent you from at least some of the bites.
Haha I know me too
Yeah. North Shore of Oahu. It is SO BEAUTIFUL up there. Camping was Amazing. Minus the bug bites
Honestly, bedbugs were last thing on my mind
I feel sorry for you!! And really appreciate your patience & understanding through it all.
Hindsight being 20/20 & all .....
I was just like hmmm maybe this is what west Philly is like?! I said I wasted nature and trees hmm maybe this is part of it
But then every night it got worse and worse
Lololol looking back, ya I feel dumb
Also, they were so Big many of them
So I assumed they were spiders
But once I woke up w like ten new ones from just one night
I thought wow that's some spider
I thought bedbug bites were teenie
Now I know that diff people react diff :) and you can be allergic to their saliva! How special of me!
Did it ever wake you up at night?
Yes!
Every hour
Hahaha!
It's a wonder you were able to sleep at all.
Like constantly
When Cindy said she thought they were spiders I was surprised but happy. I thought - Well at least it's not the bedbugs.
Anyway I'm glad they are getting better & hopefully the marks will go away soon.
There is a bad Ray Rice joke in there somewhere.
Hahaha definitely. I've been making bad ray rice jokes all week
Personally I think the bedbugs should get banned from the league indefinitely for what they did to your arms, legs etc.
They are probably even less remorseful then he is......
hahahaha well, I just want to apologize for the role I played in instigating the abuse
LOL horrible
Ugh also his apology?! Omg

"We're taking the necessary steps to move forward," he said. "My job is to lead my family. My job is to lead my wife. My job is to lead in whatever I do. And If I'm not being the example, then my family crumbles."
My job is to lead my wife?!!!! Holy shit, talk about having missed the misogyny memo!!!
"Ingrid says she deeply regrets the role that she played the nights of the bedbug incidents."
I have been told that the bed bugs accept your apology for instigating their biting you.
Hahaha!!
Lololol
See I guess it was actually your fault. Why did you instigate them??
Lol i deserved it for being such a bedbug slut! Ugh I actually was romantically involved w that psychopath mambo mover guy who , once I met his gf
Wow. You just can't make this shit up. I can't believe the team or the league didn't proofread their statements.
She said he truly would say that to her
That he cheated bc she was such a slut and he didn't trust her
Like that's some deep seated misogyny and gaslighting
Wow!! Well I guess that's being proactive.
LOL
What's gaslighting?
Oooh it's based in the movie
But it's when abusers call you crazy in order to undermine your perception of reality
Lots of my girlfriends have dated assholes who do this..
Do you think the bed bugs accused each other of cheating with you?
There are no shortage of assholes out there.
Is this the same guy who was the pathological liar?
For example 'I'm not cheating on you, you're crazy, you're paranoid so you assume the text that says 'I love you and want to have sex with you' that I wrote to my ex gf, is me being shady
But it's not! You're so clingy and crazy and don't realize it's just a game we play that is quotes from a tv show we used to watch!!
Lololol then they get MaD at the lady and say 'well if you're going to not Trust Me, then I don't need to take this abuse! I'm out!'
Then they fuck their ex
And say you drove them to it
With your distrust of them
Lololol that's gaslighting
Do girls believe that shit? Jo would kick MY ass & she is like half my size.
It's a super common playa tactic. Also shitty women do it too obv
Haha well, my coworker Sarah is a monster
She yelled and pushed me
She did this jokingly?
I told her to stop abusing me and yelling at me and she said (this is at the coffeeshop!!!!)
She said: "well, it really hurts MY feelings to be called an abuser by everyone all the time!!!!!"
"What do you keep DOiNg it make me want to hit you?!?!"
Sheeeeeeeiiiiittttt!!!!
no she is a horrible person and I don't have to work w her anymore obv
Thank God!
I just felt bad only showing examples of men being dicks
Haha so I threw in a personal example of an abusive woman haha just for funsies

My newish philosophy is there are assholes out there that go around & make everyone miserable. I am cutting myself loose of people like that. Don't hate them. Just don't talk to them & avoid thinking about them.
But she used gaslighting on me all the time
"You're crazy" she'd say to me
But she is legit crazy and everyone knows it hahaha
Yeah. Both sexes are well represented in the asshole spectrum.
Yeah!! I'm working on it
Hahaha yesss totally
And yes it's the same guy who lied about every single thing about himself
Lol I'm not even mad at him. More impressed at the gall
What I believe is that 90% of us regardless of sex, color, creed, religion etc are basically good people most of the time. We all have our bad days.
But the stories his gf told me were horrible so hopefully she doesn't let anyone treat her like that again
But I could see her apologizing for her role in being hit by him
But 10% are just evil assholes. You can't even be mad at them. It's in their DNA. It would be like getting mad at the bedbugs for biting you.
Yes! Def
Well. I'd be mad at the bedbugs but hopefully you get my point. You know the story of the scorpion & the frog?
